attributes.action: England to join as US state
attributes.additional_details: So lots will disagree however this will be a big step forward for England. It would mean easy travel between England and USA and would open the doors to tons of jobs. Just think about it you want to be a police officer but there are no jobs? Well if we were a US state you could cross the pond and try for a job in LA or NY etc. It would make us a better country.
